messages.subject: Re: Respect for the forum (was Young earth vs. old earth)
messages.msgSnippet: ... Tolerance and understanding, eh, that s the ticket! No one here is going to change their minds about evolution, abortion, or religion. This isn t a forum
messages.messageBody:
> I have friends on our block, our kids are friends too. They play
>together
>all the time. The difference is that they don't try to convert us and
>we
>don't try to convert them. And we don't use every little thing that
>comes
>our way to shove our beliefs in each other's faces.
>
>Elizabeth

Tolerance and understanding, eh, that's the ticket! No one here is going to
change their minds about evolution, abortion, or religion. This isn't a forum
of unthinking sheep who are easily swayed. I would venture to guess that most
of us here have quite a few years of email lists and usenet experience, the
kind of experience that has proven the futility of rehashing these subjects to
the point where the real point of the list gets lost in acrimony. So, let's
move on and quit with the proselytizing. Can't we get back to support for
unschooling?

Peggy


Peggy
